title: Do People Really Know What Roe v. Wade Is? | Talking With People
description: Steven Crowder hit the streets of Dallas-Fort Worth to talk to people about it—just talk. The topic of Roe v. Wade is contentious, but Americans should still be capable of talking to one another. And what he found out is we can.
itunes:author: Blaze Podcast Network
